entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Daniel's Harbour 07:30 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 100.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -9.9°C

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this morning. Snow beginning near noon. Blowing snow over exposed areas this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 14 this morning. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then cloudy with flurries beginning after midnight. Local snow squalls south of Plum Point overnight. Blowing snow overnight. Amount 2 cm except locally 10 cm south of Plum Point. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 this evening then increasing to 60 gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 over exposed areas overnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries or snow squalls. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Flurries or snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 over exposed areas early in the morning. High minus 12. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023
